Sasank qualified written examination, preliminary round to get a job offer.
Now, he is preparing for the next round i.e… VIVA round. As this is round of elimination, if he fails to answer any question asked by the interviewer immediately he will be eliminated from that round. 
This Round proceeds as follows :
Initially you will be given an array of N integers with each valued 0.
After that  C commands are given ----- 
    0 p q v -- you have to add v to all numbers in the range of p to q (inclusive), where p and q are two indexes of the array.
    * 1 p q-- output a line containing a single integer which is the sum of all the array elements between p andq (inclusive)
sasank’s  girl friend said that she will broke up with him if he fails to get this offer.
Help him  to get this job offer.


Input
Input description.
In the first line you'll be given T, number of test cases.
Each test case will start with N (N<=100 000) and C (C<=100 000). After that you'll be given C commands in the format as mentioned above. 1 <= p,q <= N and 1 <= v <= 10^7.

Output
Output description.
Print answers for the queries

Example
Input:
1
8 6
0 2 4 26
0 4 8 80
0 4 5 20
1 8 8 
0 5 7 14
1 4 8

Output:
80
508
